resources.string: View or change power menu entries
Hides the global actions menu on secure lockscreen
Show charging current, voltage, wattage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
Double tap power button (slower single tap response), Disables double power tap for camera.
Jump to camera gesture is now disabled
Double tap on lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double tap on statusbar to put the device to sleep
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the status bar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Control which status bar icons are shown
Show current network traffic levels in the status bar
Use pre-p mobiletype icons for signal (Reboot required)
Configure icon and text styles for the statusbar battery indicator
Always display battery percentage when charging
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Hide call strength icons in QuickSettings panel when available
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Different menus for customizing the udfps
Enable custom UDFPS Icon from files
Select custom image from your saved files or gallery

This removes the screenshots and screenrecords limits for all applications. Normally, special applications are replaced with black areas in records. This can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks. After changing this toggle, you may need to restart applications for the change to take effect
Swipe positions between back and recents
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Quickly disable heads up for all apps but keep it enabled only for dialer
Display volume panel on the left side of the screen
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Show in Both, QQS n QS
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Customize tiles layout in QS panel
Show only icon for QS tiles
Enable vertical layout for QS tiles
Touch status bar to toggle visibility
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Display multiuser accessibility icon when available
Set transparency level for QS background
Display text at bottom of QS panel
Set to empty for default Xtended
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications
Show lights on Always On Display
Hide AOD content when lights are showing
Display the number of pending notifications
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Show a Animation when show AoD
Enable adjustment of max lockscreen notifications
Enable adjustment of max Notif. Panel notifications
Extra features for immersive gaming experience
Spoof device as a high-end model in certain games, to unlock higher FPS
Replace your notifications with a redesigned version of tickers. \nSlim and less invasive than a standard notification
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Only enable reTicker when device is in landscape mode
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Show Ambient Display when a new music track is played
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer during music play
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Set the visualizer in center mirrored mode
Create other pulse and flip vertically
Customize the statusbar clock and date
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Allow running multiple instances of the same application in parallel
Show separate indicator when an any app uses mic or camera.(Requires SystemUI restart)
Enable - Disable location privacy indicator in qs and sb.(Requires SystemUI restart)
Enable - Disable Projection privacy indicator in qs and sb.(Requires SystemUI restart)
Enable to display logo in the status bar
Enable custom statusbar logo from files
Select custom image from your saved files or gallery
Enable custom quicksetting logo from files
Display media cover art when available
Enable or disable QS on secure lockscreen
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Show current weather condition and temperature
Weather is shown below date line with location
Weather is shown on the date line without location
Show name of current city on left of image
Show current city temperature on right of image
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB

Use custom color instead of wallpaper accent
Keep FOD enabled when the screen is off
Show a floating rotate button when device is rotated
Do not display next available shortcut if chosen shortcut is not available
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
